content: ______ before gusset length ______ to calculate gusset/heel cup row count divide the sock stitches in four and subtract 1 divide the sock stitches in half and add the two sums if your sock is 56 stitches around your gusset / heel cup will be 41 row if your sock is 64 stitches around your gusset / heel cup will be 47 row if your sock is 72 stitches around your gusset / heel cup will be 53 row if your sock is 80 stitches around your gusset / heel cup will be 59 row eagle-eyed viewers will spot the fact that the fingering weight socks have a different pattern on the front what can i say my teenager has opinions
